sources.summary: Our expert's pick of the day is that the Yankees have not finished losing. We have two MLB teams relevant to a betting system called 'La dégelée 3' on Friday. This strategy produces an average of only 17 bets per season, and we have two of them on the same day, which is rare. The system involves betting on any team that lost its previous game by at least 11 points, as long as they are facing a different opponent. The expert analyzes the performance of this system over the past two seasons, combining the results of 31 bets with an average decimal odds of 2.06. The expert's pick is that the Red Sox will win against the Yankees and the Blue Jays will rebound against the Rangers. Dimers' prediction and best bet for the game is to bet on Over 8 runs (-110). According to Dimers' independent predictive analytics model, the Yankees have a 59% chance of winning the game, and the Mets (+1.5) have a 59% chance of covering the run line. The over/under total of 8 runs has a 54% chance of going over.

sources.eng_title: Pronóstico de Apuesta: New York Yankees vs. New York Mets
sources.summary: The New York Yankees and New York Mets will face off in an exciting MLB matchup on July 23 at 7:05 pm. According to betting predictions, the Yankees have a slight advantage going into this game. Analysis of the game: Head-to-Head: The last time these teams faced off was on June 26, 2024, where the Yankees won 12-2. Historically, the Yankees have won 35 head-to-head matchups, including 18 home victories, while the Mets have won 32 times, with 14 away victories. The Yankees average 4.4 points per game in these matchups, while the Mets average 4.6 points. New York Yankees - Team Summary: In their last 10 games, the Yankees have had a balanced performance with 5 wins and 5 losses. At home, their performance is similar with 2 wins and 2 losses. In their last game, the Yankees defeated the Tampa Bay Rays 9-1. Currently, the team averages 4.4 goals per game and receives 3.6 goals. New York Mets - Team Summary: The Mets have had a solid performance in their last 10 games, with 7 wins and 3 losses. Away from home, they have won 7 of those games, losing only once. In their last game, the Mets defeated the Miami Marlins 4-6. On average, the team scores 5.2 goals per game and receives 3.8 goals. Prediction: In this matchup, both teams will showcase their defensive and offensive skills. However, considering recent performance and head-to-head history, the Yankees seem to have a slight advantage, especially playing at home. Betting Recommendation: Bet on the New York Yankees to win. The Yankees have shown consistency and solidity in their recent games, and their home performance gives them an additional advantage. Odds: 1.70. This odds offer good value considering the Yankees' historical and recent advantage in head-to-head matchups and their home performance.

sources.eng_title: MLB best bets: Mets vs. Yankees odds, picks, prediction for Tue. 7/23
sources.summary: The New York Mets and New York Yankees are set to face off in a two-game series at Yankee Stadium, with the Yankees looking for revenge after being swept by the Mets last month. The Yankees' Luis Gil will face off against the Mets' Jose Quintana, with the Yankees favored at -160. The article predicts that the Yankees will win the game, citing Gil's recent strong performances and Quintana's struggles. The author recommends taking the Yankees F5 -0.5 at -115, as well as the matchup between Quintana and Gil to reduce the amount of juice.

summary: The New York Yankees are facing the Philadelphia Phillies in a highly anticipated matchup. Both teams have been performing well recently, with the Phillies having a slight edge in their overall record.
reconciled_information: While the Yankees have a strong lineup, the Phillies have been more consistent recently and have a slight edge in pitching matchup. The home field advantage for the Phillies also plays a significant role.
unique_information: The Phillies have been particularly strong at home this season, which could be a deciding factor in this matchup.
